channel.title: Epic Villages Recruiting?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Epic Villages Recruiting?" - Looking for a village with an Epic Monument.

item.title: Re: Epic Villages Recruiting?
item.content:encoded: Dream Village should have 1 in a few days and we are a IR

item.title: Re: Epic Villages Recruiting?
item.content:encoded: Fansub just got one! And we accept all new members, as far as I know. So, if you want, you can come to us! ^-^

item.title: Epic Villages Recruiting?
item.content:encoded: Are there any villages with an Epic Monument that are looking for members? I'd really like to take a stab at a Sannin run, and even someday Survive the Impossible, and despite my best efforts giving tons of referrals, it's just never going to happen in my tiny village. Anyone out there willing to give me a shot?
